text: Timothy Daniel Considine (December 31, 1940 â€“ March 3, 2022) was an American actor, writer, photographer, and automotive historian. He was in the Disney television serials Spin and Marty and Hardy Boys. He also played Mike Douglas in the television series My Three Sons from 1960 until 1965. Considine died at his home in the Mar Vista neighborhood of Los Angeles, California on March 3, 2022, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American child actors Category:American photographers Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:American historians
title: Tim Considine
